attributes.action: get rid of car tax and put it on petrol so everyone has to pay for what the use and you cant avoid it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: put car tax on to petrol so if you drive your car more you pay more if you don't, you pay for what you use and you don't need sorn

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/roadtaxpetrol/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
